text:
Restore the configureAndWatch() methods to the PropertyConfigurator and
DOMConfigurator classes to maintain backwards api compatibility with v1.2.X. 
New implementation can use the new FileWatchdog plugin class to fix other known
problems with previous file watchdog implementation.
creator: mwomack@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
The tests committed in rev 370050 behave differently after "ant clean" than when run repeatedly.  Possibly 
initial configuration file is not restored when running the test multiple times.

The witness files for the expected output after the change to the configuration file expect that the DEBUG 
level messages have been suppressed.  I have restored the DEBUG messages to the witness file since the 
current implementation does not seem to track the changes to the configuration file.
log4j 1.3 development is abandoned, so marking WONTFIX.
creator: carnold@apache.org
